content: I like the yoga or stretching idea. I've been waking up around 8:30 am on Saturdays, which gives me enough time to fit in a 30-minute jog before showering and getting ready for the day. Maybe I can try incorporating some yoga or stretching on Sundays to loosen up after a week of sitting at a desk. Do you think it's a good idea to prioritize yoga or stretching over other exercises, considering my goal is to establish a consistent morning routine?
